attributes.action: put cctv camaras in all cemetery's in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
grave robbing and vanderlism  within our cemetery's has become a constent crime, which causes pain and suffering to those who have lost someone close to them, and there's usely nothing that can be done because theres no proof to catch the criminals doing it. 
we are calling for cctv camaras to be fitted in all cemetery's around the united kingdom.
